volunteer.title: Volunteer & Contribute
volunteer.hadith: "The Messenger of Allah (peace and blessings be upon him) said: Indeed, Allah, His angels, the inhabitants of the heavens and the earth - even the ant in its hole, and even the fish - send blessings upon the one who teaches people goodness."
volunteer.desc: We are always looking for students to hold remedial classes (online/F2F) or donate textbooks/past year tests to the library.

contact.title: Feedback & Contact
contact.subtitle: We need your voice to improve YSAG.
contact.infoDesc: Whether you have a question about resources, want to volunteer, or want to collaborate, our inbox is open.

form.emailHint: We'll never share your email with anyone.
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us what we can do better...
